Name: The Toowoomba Preparatory School (The Anglican Church of Australia)

About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment; closed public & school holidays; reference assistance available in person; limited copying facilities.

About.Access: Advance notice & purpose of visit; proof of identity required.

About.Acquisition focus: Material relating to the history, development and mission of the school; records of past students and staff; records of affiliated bodies; memorabilia.
